item.title: ::commands
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Put this bitch in an interface, I can’t stand it when servers have the messages flooding in the chatbox. With a bigger server and people constantly talking, you won’t even be able to read that list.

item.title: ::commands
item.dc:creator: @pegasus358 pegasus358
item.description:
@pegasus358 wrote:

This is my ::commands. You can edit it to your own use. What it does is it gives a different message for every rank (normal, donor,mod,admin,owner).

if (playerCommand.startsWith("commands")){ if (c.playerRights == 0){ c.sendMessage("Player Commands:"); c.sendMessage("::vote (opens up voting page)."); c.sendMessage("::claim (claims your voting reward)."); c.sendMessage("::pkp (shows your pk-points)."); c.sendMessage("::help (teleports you to help zone)."); c.sendMessage("::donate (opens up donating page)."); c.sendMessage("::request (asks staff for help)."); } if (c.playerRights == 1){ c.sendMessage("Moderator Commands:"); c.sendMessage("::vote (opens up voting page)."); c.sendMessage("::claim (claims your voting reward)."); c.sendMessage("::pkp (shows your pk-points)."); c.sendMessage("::help (teleports you to help zone)."); c.sendMessage("::donate (opens up donating page)."); c.sendMessage("::request (asks staff for help)."); c.sendMessage("::yell (shows message to entire server)."); c.sendMessage("::dice (rolls random # from 1-100)."); c.sendMessage("::jail/unjail (jails/unjails player)."); c.sendMessage("::mute/unmute (mutes/unmutes player)."); c.sendMessage("::timedmute (mutes a player during x seconds)."); c.sendMessage("::ban/unban (bans/unbans player)."); c.sendMessage("::checkbank (checks bank of a player)."); } if(c.playerRights == 2){ c.sendMessage("Administrator Commands:"); c.sendMessage("::vote (opens up voting page)."); c.sendMessage("::claim (claims your voting reward)."); c.sendMessage("::pkp (shows your pk-points)."); c.sendMessage("::help (teleports you to help zone)."); c.sendMessage("::donate (opens up donating page)."); c.sendMessage("::request (asks staff for help)."); c.sendMessage("::yell (shows message to entire server)."); c.sendMessage("::dice (rolls random # from 1-100)."); c.sendMessage("::jail/unjail (jails/unjails player)."); c.sendMessage("::mute/unmute (mutes/unmutes player)."); c.sendMessage("::ipmute/unipmute (ipmutes/unipmutes player)."); c.sendMessage("::timedmute (mutes a player during x seconds)."); c.sendMessage("::ban/unban (bans/unbans player)."); c.sendMessage("::ipban/unipban (ipbans/unipbans player)."); c.sendMessage("::timedban (timedbans a player for x seconds)."); c.sendMessage("::checkbank (checks bank of a player)."); c.sendMessage("::mark (gives player mark 5 marks = ban."); c.sendMessage("::tele (teleports player to you)."); c.sendMessage("::xteletome (teleports player to you)."); c.sendMessage("::xteleto (teleports to player."); c.sendMessage("::mypos (shows your position)."); c.sendMessage("::players (shows name and postion of every player)."); c.sendMessage("::givedonor (gives donator status to player)."); } if(c.playerRights == 3){ c.sendMessage("Owner Commands:"); c.sendMessage("::vote (opens up voting page)."); c.sendMessage("::claim (claims your voting reward)."); c.sendMessage("::pkp (shows your pk-points)."); c.sendMessage("::help (teleports you to help zone)."); c.sendMessage("::donate (opens up donating page)."); c.sendMessage("::request (asks staff for help)."); c.sendMessage("::yell (shows message to entire server)."); c.sendMessage("::dice (rolls random # from 1-100)."); c.sendMessage("::jail/unjail (jails/unjails player)."); c.sendMessage("::mute/unmute (mutes/unmutes player)."); c.sendMessage("::ipmute/unipmute (ipmutes/unipmutes player)."); c.sendMessage("::timedmute (mutes a player during x seconds)."); c.sendMessage("::ban/unban (bans/unbans player)."); c.sendMessage("::ipban/unipban (ipbans/unipbans player)."); c.sendMessage("::timedban (timedbans a player for x seconds)."); c.sendMessage("::checkbank (checks bank of a player)."); c.sendMessage("::mark (gives player mark 5 marks = ban."); c.sendMessage("::tele (teleports player to you)."); c.sendMessage("::xteletome (teleports player to you)."); c.sendMessage("::xteleto (teleports to player."); c.sendMessage("::alltome (teleports everyone to you."); c.sendMessage("::mypos (shows your position)."); c.sendMessage("::players (shows name and postion of every player)."); c.sendMessage("::givedonor (gives donator status to player)."); c.sendMessage("::givemod (gives mod status to player)."); c.sendMessage("::giveadmin (gives admin to player)."); c.sendMessage("::bank (opens up bank)."); c.sendMessage("::empty (emptys inventory)."); c.sendMessage("::invclear (clears inventory of player)."); c.sendMessage("::getid (gives id # of an item)."); c.sendMessage("::item (spawns item)."); c.sendMessage("::master (gives all 99s)."); c.sendMessage("::pure (gives pure stats)."); c.sendMessage("::who (gives name, pass, IP, Location)."); c.sendMessage("::spec (gives 10000 spec)."); } if (c.playerRights == 4){ c.sendMessage("Donator Commands:"); c.sendMessage("::vote (opens up voting page)."); c.sendMessage("::claim (claims your voting reward)."); c.sendMessage("::pkp (shows your pk-points)."); c.sendMessage("::help (teleports you to help zone)."); c.sendMessage("::donate (opens up donating page)."); c.sendMessage("::request (asks staff for help)."); c.sendMessage("::yell (shows message to entire server)."); c.sendMessage("::dice (rolls random # from 1-100"); } }
credits:
100% me

Read full topic
